ValidationRule.description: Only the ALR Admin and Data Analyst will be able to update WebsitePostConfirmed, DatePosted, PostingRemovalDate fields (even after the case is closed). All other users can view these fields - ALR-77
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Permission.EHISBypassValidationRuleCustomPermission) && IsClosed = TRUE && PRIORVALUE(IsClosed) = TRUE && (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PublicComplaintCase' || (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ReportableIncident' && ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId))) && NOT( ($Permission.EHISAdminUser || $Permission.EHISDataAnalystUser) && (ISCHANGED(WebsitePostConfirmed__c) || ISCHANGED(DatePosted__c) || ISCHANGED(PostingRemovalDate__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(Status) || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(OwnerId)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case is Closed and cannot be edited
